title: How to Strengthen Fine Motor Skills with Modelling Clay
body: As already mentioned, plastic straws are not considered earth friendly. This activity is a good way to reuse plastic straws you might still have on hand that would otherwise go to the garbage. You can also substitute craft sticks or reusable straws to provide the activity. Learning through play with modelling clay. 1. Cut straws in various lengths.

The post provides ideas for child-led activities that support creative play and the development of fine motor abilities. These activities involve using modeling clay and straws to engage children in cutting, squeezing, pressing, and math skills, while also encouraging creative and engineering skills. It also emphasizes the importance of strengthening hand muscles for future developmental skills.
